channel.title: ::item command help needed!

item.title: ::item command help needed!
item.dc:creator: @themightydil themightydil
item.description:
@themightydil wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:420905”]something like
if(commandequals(item)
return false

or make it for owners only or something like
of(commandequals(item) && playerrights >= 2[/quote]

I know how to make it Admin+ and stuff, how do I make just some specific items not be able to be spawend?

Read full topic

item.title: ::item command help needed!
item.dc:creator: @themightydil themightydil
item.description:
@themightydil wrote:

Hey guys,
Ive decided to make a new Server
Spawn and PvP

Here is my ::item command, I want to know how I can make some item unspawnable?

	if (command[0].equals("item")) {

		if (command.length == 3) {
			player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]),
					Integer.parseInt(command[2]));
		} else {
			player.getInventory().addItem(Integer.parseInt(command[1]), 1);
		}
		player.getInventory().refresh();
	}

I want 995 and a few other items unspawnable, if someone could help me I’d really appreciate it.
Im using Dementhium 639.

Read full topic
